original_text: And when he was demanded of the Pharisees, when the kingdom of God should come, he answered them and said, The kingdom of God cometh not with observation:
korean_text: 바리새인들이 하나님의 나라가 어느 때에 임하나이까 묻거늘 예수께서 대답하여 이르시되 하나님의 나라는 볼 수 있게 임하는 것이 아니요

sentences.original_text: And when he was demanded of the Pharisees
when the kingdom of God should come
The kingdom of God cometh not with observation
